title: Bird Paradise - Egg Splash
description: Bird Paradise is a wildlife park in Singapore. It is home to 3,500 birds from over 400 species. The park features a variety of exhibits, including a waterfall aviary, a penguin coast, and a rainforest walk. Visitors can also enjoy bird shows and feeding sessions. Egg Splash is an event held at Bird Paradise.
